price: Moo Kuusaa Gooftaa keetiitu isaan bira jira, moo isaantu injifattoota?
arabic: أَمۡ عِندَهُمۡ خَزَآئِنُ رَبِّكَ أَمۡ هُمُ ٱلۡمُصَۜيۡطِرُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: am ʿindahum khazāinu rabbika am humu al-muṣayṭirūna
